title: Are end of season rewards based on Finishing Rank or Highest rank achieved?
body: I am about to de-rank, but don't wont to stop playing Ranked. Well... Question is in the title

replies.body: End of season rank. So if you are Silver 5 and get demoted an hour before end of season, you get the lucky title of bronze 1 and its rewards.
better to go unranked if its anything below plat 3 if we are being real.
Gold gets me a free skin so I'm happy there :)
